User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application.

id.description: A unique identifier for the user, typically the Firestore document ID.

name.description: The display name of the user.

id.description: A unique identifier for the entry, typically the Firestore document ID.

date.description: The ISO 8601 date string of when the entry was created.

moodScore.description: A numerical score from 1 to 5 representing the user's mood.

text.description: The text content of the journal entry.

prompt.description: An optional prompt that inspired the entry.

userId.description: The ID of the user who created the entry, linking to a User document.
